Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the amount of credit for cider, wine, and liquor under the alcoholic beverage production credit
Summary: Relates to the amount of credit for cider, wine, and liquor produced in NYS under the alcoholic beverage production credit; provides parity with beer credit based on the taxes for cider, wine, and liquor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the amount of credit for cider, wine, and liquor under the alcoholic beverage production credit
